Constants
AlarmState

Contains the state of the alarm, None, BelowLimit or above AboveLimit.

Functions
AlarmManagement
function AlarmManagement(
alarmCallback,
lowerLimit,
upperLimit,
borderID
)

This function is used to test the measurement values and to return the AlarmState in form of a callback function.  NOTE: Dont instanciate this function directly. Instead use the inhereted functions.

Parameters
alarmCallback

Callback function that returns the AlarmState.

lowerLimit

Contains a predefined lower alarm level.

upperLimit

Contains a predefined upper alarm level.

borderID

Contains the ID of the DOM-Elements to show the alarm-border.

testMeasurementValueForAlarm
this.testMeasurementValueForAlarm = function(
value
)

This function checks the parameter value for its limits and invokes the callback with the current AlarmState.

Parameters
value

This parameter is the currently tested value.

deactivateMeasurement
this.deactivateMeasurement = function()

If the Value was deactivated from the Trainerside, the Alarm is switched off.

performUIAdaption
function performUIAdaption(
state
)

Performs the UI changes to visually indicate alarms.

Parameters
state

Contains the AlarmState.

ECGAlarm
function ECGAlarm(
alarmCallback
)

This inherited function provides corresponding default lower and upper bounds for the alarm.

See also: AlarmManagement.

This inherited function provides corresponding default lower and upper bounds for the alarm.
